item.description:
Here's a great holiday shopping event in Boston for pet lovers (please - no personal pets). If you come, let us know you're from the NEBBC!

Holiday Pet Shoppes - One Day Only!
December 8, 2012, Noon to 6 pm
Sheraton Boston Hotel
Free admission
http://bit.ly/TZ4sbs

Over a dozen carefully selected pet vendors from throughout New England will showcase their unique products for shoppers to discover and buy.

• Free to attend.
• Many of the vendors only sell their products online, so this is a one-time chance to see the products in person.
• Feel good while you shop! Many of the vendors donate a portion of profits to charities.
• Come meet Lilly the Hero Pit Bull at the event starting at 5 pm!
• Enter to win one of the great giveaway items
• Show your support for small businesses and meet the founders
• Fairy Dog Parents will be hosting the Charity Gift Wrap Station

We love pets, too - however, please no personal pets at the event (service animals excluded). We don't want your furry friend to be stressed by the holiday crowds (plus we want your present to be a secret!).

For updates, follow @PetShoppes on Twitter: http://bit.ly/UsexT5
#petshoppes

Are you a blogger, distributor, or media? Contact us about a private viewing with the vendors. info@eventfizz.com

Thanks to our Exclusive Event Sponsor, CitySide Subaru, an active and long-standing partner to the pet community. CitySide Subaru was recognized as the 2012 BEST Auto Dealership in the greater Boston region by the Boston A List. Visit them at: http://bit.ly/RiSA9J
item.name: Holiday Pet Shoppes - Dec. 8
